vulnerabilities: Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources
Use of Externally-Controlled Input to Select Classes or Code ('Unsafe Reflection')
description: The function is vulnerable as it uses the 'apply' method on a function pointer 'fnPtr' which can be manipulated to execute arbitrary code. This can lead to 'Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources' (CWE-915). Also, the function uses externally controlled input to select classes or code which can lead to 'Unsafe Reflection' (CWE-470).
